Package ch.bt.emm

Interface TwoRoundEMM

All Known Implementing Classes:
DifferentiallyPrivateVolumeHidingEMM
public interface TwoRoundEMM
This interface specifies the algorithms of a 2-interactive EMM scheme.

  • Method Details

    • setup

      List<SecretKey> setup(int securityParameter) throws GeneralSecurityException, IOException
      Parameters:
      securityParameter - the length of the keys in bits
      Returns:
      two secret keys, one for the PRF and one for the symmetric encryption scheme
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException
      IOException

    • buildIndex

      EncryptedIndex buildIndex(Map<Label,Set<Plaintext>> multiMap) throws GeneralSecurityException, IOException
      Parameters:
      multiMap - the plaintext data stored in a multimap
      Returns:
      the encrypted index of the multimap according to the scheme
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException
      IOException

    • trapdoor

      SearchToken trapdoor(Label searchLabel) throws GeneralSecurityException, IOException
      Parameters:
      searchLabel - the search label in plaintext
      Returns:
      a search token that enables access to the entries in the encrypted index counter tables that correspond to the search label.
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException
      IOException

    • trapdoor

      SearchToken trapdoor(Label label, Set<Ciphertext> ciphertexts) throws GeneralSecurityException, IOException
      Parameters:
      label - the search label in plaintext
      ciphertexts - the ciphertexts of the counter table returned by search
      Returns:
      a search token that enables access to the entry in the encrypted index that corresponds to the search label.
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException
      IOException

    • search

      Set<Ciphertext> search(SearchToken searchToken, EncryptedIndex encryptedIndex) throws GeneralSecurityException, IOException
      Parameters:
      searchToken - the search token that has been generated with trapdoor
      encryptedIndex - the encrypted index of the counter tables
      Returns:
      the set of ciphertexts in the counter tables that correspond to the label encrypted in the token
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException
      IOException

    • search2

      Set<Ciphertext> search2(SearchToken searchToken, EncryptedIndex encryptedIndex) throws IOException
      Parameters:
      searchToken - the search token that has been generated with trapdoor(label, ciphertexts)
      encryptedIndex - the encrypted index of the value tables
      Returns:
      the set of ciphertexts that correspond to the label encrypted in the token
      Throws:
      IOException

    • result

      Set<Plaintext> result(Set<Ciphertext> ciphertexts, Label searchLabel) throws GeneralSecurityException
      Parameters:
      ciphertexts - the set of ciphertexts that search2 found for a given token
      searchLabel - the search label in plaintext
      Returns:
      the set of plaintexts that have been encrypted to those ciphertexts using the given ivs and the schemeKey
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException

    • getNumberOfDummyValues

      int getNumberOfDummyValues()
      Getter for the number of dummy entries in the encrypted index
      Returns:
      the number of dummy values in the value tables

    • getNumberOfDummyCT

      int getNumberOfDummyCT()
      Getter for the number of dummy entries in the encrypted index
      Returns:
      the number of dummy values in the counter tables

    • getSeScheme

      SEScheme getSeScheme()
      Getter for the encryption scheme
      Returns:
      the encryption scheme instance
